scripts.dev: npm run preload -- nest start --watch | npm run pino-pretty
scripts.debug: npm run preload -- nest start --debug --watch | npm run pino-pretty
scripts.start: node -r tsconfig-paths/register build/main | npm run pino-datadog
scripts.pino-datadog: if [ -n "${DD_API_KEY}" ]; then pino-datadog; else cat; fi
scripts.migration:gen: npm run preload -- typeorm-ts-node-esm migration:generate -d src/database/datasource.ts
scripts.migration:show: npm run preload -- typeorm-ts-node-esm migration:show -d src/database/datasource.ts
scripts.migration:run: npm run preload -- typeorm-ts-node-esm migration:run -d src/database/datasource.ts
scripts.migration:revert: npm run preload -- typeorm-ts-node-esm migration:revert -d src/database/datasource.ts
scripts.seed:gen: npm run preload -- typeorm-ts-node-esm migration:generate -d src/database/datasource-seed.ts
scripts.seed:show: npm run preload -- typeorm-ts-node-esm migration:show -d src/database/datasource-seed.ts
scripts.seed:run: npm run preload -- typeorm-ts-node-esm migration:run -d src/database/datasource-seed.ts
scripts.seed:revert: npm run preload -- typeorm-ts-node-esm migration:revert -d src/database/datasource-seed.ts
